name: WATER FROG and the Journey to the Pond!
name_original: WATER FROG and the Journey to the Pond!
description:
Greetings player. A lost frog needs its help to get to the pond within a time frame. But the timer seems to be broken...

Made for the Mini-Jam 106

(The theme was Frogs and the limitation was limited time)

A & D - MOVE

W / SPACE - JUMP

R - RESET

There is a bug where movement stops, just go the other way and back and it should be fixed.

(hints appear if they are required after 40 seconds. the hints appear above any text that is already on the level)

CREDITS

The game was entirely made by Odiwa (me).

The apps I used were:

Unity - Game Engine

Aseprite - Art

Ableton Live 11 Intro - Music

Visual Studio Code - Code

Paint.net - Extra Sprites / Images
